page.title: 08POINTON-HEALTH & TRANSPORT
page.content: {HEALTH { }The inhabitants of Pointon have neither a doctor nor a nurse in the village. Billingborough 1.5 miles away has 2 doctors,a medical centre and a district nurse. Rippingale,just over 3 miles to the south also has a doctor. The nearest emergency services - Police and Fire Brigade - are at Billingborough or Bourne about 7.5 miles to the south. {TRANSPORT { }There is no longer any railway in Pointon but 3 bus companies operate limited services.Kimes of Folkingham run a daily service to Grantham and to Boston on market days.Delaine of Bourne run a daily service to Bourne and then on to Peterborough.Wings of Sleaford run a service between Bourne & Sleaford via Pointon on a Thursday. Most people have their own cars.
